name: NearOS (deprecated)
body:
# NearOS Project

## IMPORTANT ! This page present the old version of NearOS, which is deprecated. Please see the new one on my GitHub.

NearOS is a WebOS which permit you to access to a virtual computer everywhere, on every computer and every browser. It is developped in HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.

## Downloads

You can download the [GitHub project](https://github.com/ClementNerma/NearOS-deprecated) or use Git to download it on command-line :

```
git clone https://github.com/ClementNerma/NearOS-deprecated.git
```

## License

This project is under the [Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International - No commercial - No derivative terms](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/) license terms.

## Bugs and data lost

I'm not responsible for any damage caused to your computer by NearOS, including data lost, bugs, etc. 

## Currently in Beta

The project is currently in beta version, so it may contains bugs. If you find one, say it to me in the [issues](https://github.com/ClementNerma/NearOS/issues) !

# Contact me

You can contact me at the following adress : [clement.nerma@gmail.com](mailto:clement.nerma@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
